Attributes.description: History and methods of economic geography. Location of resource industries, manufacturing, and service activities with emphasis on British Columbia in its North American and world setting. Recommended for students with no previous exposure to geographies of the economy, before taking other courses in the 36x and 46x series.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Tue Thu, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 15:30, Building: Geography, Room: 200
